alert.note: Alert for Logan (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 10:19PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern McDowell, southeastern Mingo, south central Logan and southwestern Wyoming Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1017 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Amherstdale-Robinette to Red Jacket. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Welch, Pineville, Man, Hanover, R.d. Bailey Lake, Mallory, Gilbert Creek, Amherstdale-Robinette, Gilbert, Davy, Kimball, Clear Fork, Coal Mountain, Hampden, Pie, Bruno, Wolf Pen and Baileysville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
